A proclamation against robbers and vagabounds, &c. Scotland. Privy Council. Scotland. Sovereign (1694-1702 : William II)
1 sheet ([1] p.)
Printed by the heirs and successors of Andrew Anderson, Printer to the Kings most excellent Majesty, Edinburgh : Anno Dom. 1697.
Caption title. Royal arms at head of text. Intentional blank spaces in text. Signed: Gilb. Eliot. Cls. Sti. Concilii. Dated: Given under Our Signet at Edinburgh the twenty eight day of December, and of Our Reign the ninth year 1697. Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
=======
